citeulike_paper.title: Planning-Based Control of Software Agents
citeulike_paper.abstract: this paper is not intended to be a comprehensive survey of important softbot projects --- there are far too many interesting systems for me to describe them all. I focus on UniversityofWashington projects, because I am most familiar with this body of work and because the Washington softbots have emphasized planning-based control.

source.title: In PROC. 3RD INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ARTI CIAL INTELLIGENCE PLANNING SYTEMS (1996), pp. 268-274ￂﾠ Key: citeulike:11506114
